With more than 83,000 followers, Jason Pollock is one of the 140 most influential people on Twitter, according to a report in The New York Times. Social media is a powerful tool when used for philanthropy and to highlight innovative products like the new Ford Focus, Jason Pollock said.`` I'm thrilled to be participating in this historic social media event and to be raising money for my father's FREE Partnerships.'' Chrysler emerged from bankruptcy in June 2009 and is now under the management control of Italy's Fiat SpA, which has a 25 percent stake in the U.S. automaker. Sergio Marchionne is also CEO of Fiat. As the only parties willing to underwrite the risk associated with Chrysler's recovery plan, the two governments levied interest rates that, although appropriate at the time, are above current market conditions, Sergio Marchionne said.
